intro.description: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of creating a provider model.

item.title: Creating the Workflow
item.description:
Create a model Provider in a dynamic Web project with the following workflow:
1. Create a manual trigger.
2. Create a manual activity named Collect Customer Information.
3. Create a subsequent application activity named Send Notification Email.
4. Create a structured data Customer Information. Make sure the Visibility Public option is selected.
5. Provide In and Out data mapping between the data and the manual activity.
6. Similarly, create a structured data Email Address.
7. Add the fields Fromaddress and Toaddress.
8. Add an In data mapping from activity Collect Customer Information.
9. Add an Out data mapping to activity Send Notification Email.
10. Define a mail application and connect it to the Send Notification Email activity. Make sure that the Visibility Public option is selected.
11. Define the Administrator as participant for the required elements in the model.

item.title: Defining a Process Interface
item.description:
Now define the process interface:
1. In the Outline View, double-click on process Collect Customer Information to open its property page.
2. Click on Process Interface and select Provider Process Interface from the drop-down list.
3. Click Add to define a Formal Parameter 1 of the process interface.
4. Select INOUT from the Direction drop-down list.
5. Select Customer Information from the Data Type and Data drop-down lists.
6. Click Apply and OK.
Now the provider model is ready and you can proceed with creating the consumer model.
